name: AI/ML Scoring
description: Scoring template for AI/ML super-sector patents. Includes model architecture, training efficiency, and inference deployment metrics.

questions.question: How fundamental is this patent to neural network or ML model architectures? Consider transformers, CNNs, RNNs, attention mechanisms, and novel architectural innovations.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the model architecture elements and explain their significance to ML systems.

questions.question: Does this patent improve ML training efficiency? Consider distributed training, gradient optimization, data preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, and resource utilization.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe training improvements and their practical impact on model development.

questions.question: How does this patent address ML inference and deployment? Consider model optimization, quantization, edge deployment, serving infrastructure, and real-time inference.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe inference optimizations and deployment scenarios.

questions.question: How broadly applicable is this AI/ML patent across different domains? Consider NLP, computer vision, recommendation systems, autonomous systems, and generative AI.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify applicable AI domains and explain cross-domain relevance.
